please config Login.Module.Name in web.xml 璇ユ规login瀵EJB璁块锛login规瀹琛锛浠ヨ块琚EJB浜? 璇ョ被ュ㈡风绛?杩RMI瀵EJB瀹琛璁块? 1. login-config.xml缃ClientLoginModule锛缂虹锛 2. login-config.xml涓缃Login.Module.Name 锛濡涓锛杩峰宸辩版搴? 瀹颁绯伙 java:/Security SELECT password FROM User WHERE name = ? SELECT RL.name, 'Roles' FROM role as RL, user as U , users_roles as RU WHERE U.userid = RU.userid and RU.roleid = RL.roleid and U.name = ? jboss.jca:service=LocalTxCM,name=Security 3. ㄥ㈡风璋ㄦlogin锛冲瀹板规EJB璁块?
